messages.content:
You are tasked with adding English translations to a set of stakeholder quotes. For each quote:
- If the quote is in English, add "N.A." as the translation
- If the quote is in any other language, provide an accurate English translation

Input format is a markdown table with stakeholder names and quotes.
Output should be a markdown table with three columns: name, original quote, and translation.

IMPORTANT RULES:
- Never translate English quotes to English - use "N.A." instead.
- Only and always translate non-English quotes.
- If the original quote, in the third column of the md table is not in english, translate it and add the translation in the 4th column, as described below, but that is only when the quote is not in English.
- Keep original quotes exactly as they are.
- Maintain the markdown table format, without including any horizontal divider lines

Example input:
| Pierre Dupont | Consumer | "Cette décision est importante." |
| John Smith | Fortescue's corporate lawyer | "We need to review this carefully." |

Example output:
| Pierre Dupont | Consumer | "Cette décision est importante." | "This decision is important." |
| John Smith | Fortescue's corporate lawyer | "We need to review this carefully." | N.A. |

Example input:
| [Person Name 1] | Person Role 1 | [Original Quote in another language (e.g. Dutch, French, German, Spanish,eyc..)] |
| [person Name 2] | Person Role 2 | [Original Quote in English] |

Example output:
| [person Name 1] | Person Role 1 | [Original Quote in another language (e.g. Dutch, French, German, Spanish,etc..)] | [Translated Quote] |
| [person Name 2] | Person Role 2 | [Original Quote in English] | N.A. |

If the input is "None", return "None". if the original quote is not in English, make sure it is translated. Add "N.A" if the quote is already in English.

Input quotes:
| Andrew Forrest | Founder of Fortescue | "I think there is still very high demand in China. The iron ore consumption doesn't go up in a straight direction, it has a jiggered edge on an upwards curve and we're in one of those downward edges right now, but the trend will still be strong." |
| Andrew Forrest | Founder of Fortescue | "I just came back from China where I went to ascertain with our leaders, with China's leaders, where they want to go with green metals." |
| Andrew Forrest | Founder of Fortescue | "The pollution over the skies of China isn't sustainable. They need to keep on building their cities but if they can do it in a way that doesn't cause any harm then they're going to take that shot." |
| Dino Otranto | Chief Executive of Fortescue Metals | "Hydrogen and fuels made using renewable energy will have a role to play in decarbonising mining, whether it's in buses, heavy mining equipment such as haul trucks and excavators, or producing green iron." |
| Andrew Forrest | Founder of Fortescue | "This program has really been a game changer for us and it wouldn't be where it is today without the dedication of all of you - our First Nations business partners, and the incredible Fortescue team driving forward this initiative." |

| Andrew Forrest | Founder of Fortescue | "I think there is still very high demand in China. The iron ore consumption doesn't go up in a straight direction, it has a jiggered edge on an upwards curve and we're in one of those downward edges right now, but the trend will still be strong." | N.A. |
| Andrew Forrest | Founder of Fortescue | "I just came back from China where I went to ascertain with our leaders, with China's leaders, where they want to go with green metals." | N.A. |
| Andrew Forrest | Founder of Fortescue | "The pollution over the skies of China isn't sustainable. They need to keep on building their cities but if they can do it in a way that doesn't cause any harm then they're going to take that shot." | N.A. |
| Dino Otranto | Chief Executive of Fortescue Metals | "Hydrogen and fuels made using renewable energy will have a role to play in decarbonising mining, whether it's in buses, heavy mining equipment such as haul trucks and excavators, or producing green iron." | N.A. |
| Andrew Forrest | Founder of Fortescue | "This program has really been a game changer for us and it wouldn't be where it is today without the dedication of all of you - our First Nations business partners, and the incredible Fortescue team driving forward this initiative." | N.A. |
